summary:
Elon Musk loses $16 billion in a day as Telsa stock sinks - Musk remains the world's richest man, with an estimated net worth of $232 billion

 Overdue credit card balances have hit the highest level on record - Card balances more than 60 days late topped 2.5% in the first quarter, the Philadelphia Fed found

 No, Kamala Harris won't be speaking at the Bitcoin conference - The CEO of the Bitcoin conference confirmed that he had been in touch with Harris, but she won't attend

 Walmart, Aldi, and Kroger produce is under FDA recall - A major farm and food distributor has recalled multiple produce products due to possible listeria contamination
